name: cars
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_data.
Tool description: Use this API to pull relevant automobile data such as the car make, model, type, and year.
API description: Fetches and filters a list of cars from the RapidAPI service.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

year.description: Filter cars by year of manufacture.

type.description: Filter cars by type (e.g., SUV, sedan).
